title: 921 MINNESOTA AVENUEKANSAS CITY, KANSAS env docs

communications.subject: The Kansas Open Records Act Request: 921 MINNESOTA AVENUEKANSAS CITY, KANSAS env docs
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the The Kansas Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

All public environmental records in KDHE’s possession regarding the following property:

Address:
921 Minnesota Avenue
Kansas City, Kansas 66101

Specifically, I am requesting:

Any Phase I or Phase II Environmental Site Assessments performed on the site

Records showing the site's status within the Kansas Drycleaner Environmental Response Trust Fund

Copies of any remediation plans, site investigations, sampling results, or cleanup actions

Any institutional controls, use restrictions, or environmental covenants recorded or proposed for the site

All correspondence, reports, or determinations by KDHE or contractors related to the site’s environmental condition or eligibility for redevelopment

I would prefer electronic copies if available. If there are any fees associated with fulfilling this request, please inform me of the cost in advance.

Please feel free to contact me at [your phone number] or [your email address] if you need clarification or additional information.

Thank you for your assistance and commitment to transparency.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Matthew Hoppock

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: FOIA - Kimberly Wells
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

An electronic copy of the bodycam footage regarding the Kimberly Wells incident that occurred on July 18, 2022 at the Los Gavenos Bar located at 1101 N Hickory St, Joliet, IL 60435.
Specifically, I am seeking to obtain electronic copies of the:

1. BWC footage recorded by Joliet PD's responding officers detailing their full involvement in this incident

To assist you in locating the footage here are the key details of the incident:
Date of Event: July 18, 2022
Names: Kimberly Wells
Location of Event: 1101 N Hickory St, Joliet, IL 60435

Please let me know if you require further information to process it.

If any aspects of this request are denied, please cite each specific exemption you feel justifies the refusal to release the information and please notify me of the appeal procedures available to me under the law.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Marius Christensen

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: FOIA - Kimberly Wells
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

An electronic copy of the bodycam footage regarding the Kimberly Wells incident that occurred on June 28, 2022 at around 1935 hours at Crow's Nest Tavern 1400 N Center St, Joliet, IL 60435. 

Specifically, I am seeking to obtain electronic copies of the:

1. BWC footage recorded by Joliet PD's officers responding to the incident detailing their full involvement in this incident

To assist you in locating the footage here are the key details of the incident:
Date of Event: June 28, 2022
Names: Kimberly Wells
Location of Event: 1400 N Center St, Joliet, IL 60435

Please let me know if you require further information to process it.

If any aspects of this request are denied, please cite each specific exemption you feel justifies the refusal to release the information and please notify me of the appeal procedures available to me under the law.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Marius Christensen
